Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: Westbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/108th
ShortDescription: Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 109th, Wallace, 107th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/108th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 109th, Wallace, 107th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/108th.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Colfax
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses rerouted WB via 79th, South Shore, 75th, Yates & 79th; EB via 79th, Yates, 83rd, Exchange & 79th due to fire department activity nr 79th/Colfax.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near 79th/Colfax.

  • Westbound buses will operate via 79th, South Shore, 75th, Yates, then will resume their normal routes on 79th.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Yates, 83rd, Exchange, then will resume their normal routes on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
